titles.title: Years I Spent In Vanity And Pride

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Years I spent in vanity and pride, Knowing not my Lord was crucified. Nor that it was for me He died, On Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mercy there is great and grace is free. Pardon there is multiplied to me. There my ransomed soul finds liberty. At Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh the love that drew salvationâ€™s plan Oh the love that brought it down to man. Oh the mighty gulf that God did span, On Calvary{/lang-eng}
